CustomField.description: Pulls all selections from Desk Equipment Required into one field
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "1 Monitor"), "1 Monitor" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "2 Monitors"), "2 Monitors" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Desktop"), "Desktop" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Docking Station"), "Docking Station" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Headset-Computer"), "Headset-Computer" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Laptop"), "Laptop" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Power User/Tech Laptop"), "Power User/Tech Laptop" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Special Equipment"), "Special Equipment" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Tablet-Android"), "Tablet-Android" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Tablet-iPad"), "Tablet-iPad" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Tablet-Windows"), "Tablet-Windows" + "," , NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( Worker_will_require__c , "Video Cam/Web Cam"), "Video Cam/Web Cam" + "," , NULL)
CustomField.label: Desk Equipt Compilation
